docs.snippet: That empty seat on the Syracuse bench, the one on the team bus, and the one on the airplane rides to road games over the past month won't be empty anymore — coach Jim Boeheim returns to the sidelines on Saturday night after serving a nine-ga...
docs.lead_paragraph: That empty seat on the Syracuse bench, the one on the team bus, and the one on the airplane rides to road games over the past month won't be empty anymore — coach Jim Boeheim returns to the sidelines on Saturday night after serving a nine-game suspension.

headline.main: Syracuse's Jim Boeheim Returns After 9-Game Suspension

docs.snippet: Public campaigns and promotions have helped lift attendance at museums, theaters and nightclubs after the slump caused by the Nov. 13 attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Public campaigns and promotions have helped lift attendance at museums, theaters and nightclubs after the slump caused by the Nov. 13 attacks.
docs.abstract: November 2015 Paris terrorist attacks were largely assault on city's cultural institutions; museum attendance has started to recover, while city's storied cabarets and bars are slower to regain previous crowds; hopeful officials mount social media campaign in effort to promote patronage of cultural venues.

headline.main: Paris Museums and Nightclubs Show Signs of Recovery After Attacks
headline.print_headline: A Moveable Feast, Slowly Regaining Its Spirit

docs.snippet: Few Brazilian athletes will be watched as intensely as Rafaela Silva, who is looking for redemption after being disqualified from the 2012 London Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Few Brazilian athletes will be watched as intensely as Rafaela Silva, who is looking for redemption after being disqualified from the 2012 London Games.
docs.abstract: Profile of Brazilian martial artist Rafaela Silva, 2013 world judo champion who hopes to win her first Olympic medal at 2016 Rio de Janeiro Games; Silva was disqualified from 2012 London Olympics during preliminary match for illegal hold.

headline.main: From Rio’s Slums, a Judo Champion Is Mining Olympic Gold
